 Yet Thomas Jefferson was able to say that 200 years ago. It just demonstrates how activist the Christians have been in wresting control of this country since its founding, while simultaneously complaining how activist non-Christians have become. How many times have we heard the religious proclaim, "We need to take back our country!" Take back, indeed. If they only knew.
 
 And I really see no relief, save a scientific breakthrough or discovery which sets a critical mass in this country to once again lay the tired, sick, old man known as organized religion back on his deathbed. Meanwhile, our selection of presidential candidates (and politicians) will remain ashamedly limited.

Who would you rather have fingering the nuclear button, an atheist who fully understands the consequences and ramifications, or one who believes the events unfolding are all fore-ordained, and by pushing the button will allow Jesus to finally return?
